derivation: or מוֹל; (Deuteronomy 1:1), or מוֹאל; (Nehemiah 12:38), or מֻל; (Numbers 22:5), from H4135 (מוּל);
outline:
1. front
    1. front
    2. in the opposite direction
  2. in front of
    1. in front of
    2. (with prefix)
      1. towards the front of, to the front of, on the front of
      2. from the front of, off the front of, close in front of, on the forefront of
kjv_def: (over) against, before, (fore-) front, from, (God-) ward, toward, with.
strongs_def: properly, abrupt, i.e. a precipice; by implication, the front; used only adverbially (with prepositional prefix) opposite
